instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.largeMapInfo: You can choose a municipality by clicking on the large map. You can also choose a municipality by searching for it in the search bar. Selected parameter in the picture is number of men. Map legend shows color coded info of values. Hovering over a municipality shows quick info on the top right corner. Next you will learn about parameter selection.
instructions.parameterSelectorInfo: You can choose a parameter by clicking on the drop down menu of "Choose a parameter" box.
instructions.smallMapInfo: After selecting a municipality a smaller map appears for more specific examination. In the map you can see postal code areas and color coded values. Picture is currently showing Kittilä and number of men.
instructions.previewTableInfo: By clicking a postal code area you can add the area's information to a table. There you can compare the areas with the chosen parameter. You can also search for an area with its postal code or name similar to the large map.
instructions.twoMapsInfo: You can have two smaller maps visible at the same time. By clicking the name of the municipality you can change which municipality gets swapped if you click another municipality on the larger map. The municipality written in yellow gets changed, the red one stays.

about.title: Our project
about.project: Ponse (Postnumber search) is a service where you can compare Finland's postal code areas.
